_xResult.title: Balodana Measuring Tape
_xResult.longdesc:
Is your measuring tape confined to a junk drawer or tool box? You won't want to hide this adorable and useful accessory! Clip it to your keys, briefcase or bag. We are always surprised at how often we find ourselves using our Balodana key chains when we're out and about. And of course, it's the easiest way to check your measurements when ordering clothes from Balodana or any site.

 

Buy two and give one to a friend!

 

The tape measures both metric (cm) and imperial (inches), up to 5 feet. Hidden retractor button on the flat side. Vegan leather covering and tassel; metal accents and keychain.

 

Price includes shipping and handling, standard shipping USPS rates, and delivery is usually 7-10 days.
